help.title: Help Center
help.gambling.title: Gambling Awareness — Protecting Rational Choices
help.gambling.intro: Gambling is a form of entertainment, but if uncontrolled, it can seriously impact your finances, emotions, and even relationships. To help you enjoy betting responsibly, we sincerely remind you — raising awareness is every participant's responsibility.
help.gambling.s1.title: Gambling Is Not a Path to Wealth
help.gambling.s1.content: Do not view gambling as a way to make money. Over time, greed and unrealistic expectations may lead to greater losses and even debt. True financial stability comes from sound financial planning and steady income, not games of chance.
help.gambling.s2.title: Set a Budget and Never Overspend
help.gambling.s2.content: Before participating, set a budget and time limit you can afford. When funds run out, do not make additional withdrawals or borrow money to place bets. Learning to be responsible is the first step to avoiding addiction.
help.gambling.s3.title: Stay Emotionally Stable, Avoid Emotional Betting
help.gambling.s3.content: When emotions run high, it's easy to make irrational choices such as doubling down or acting recklessly. Wins and losses are normal — learning to walk away calmly is the real victory.
help.gambling.s4.title: Understand Gambling Risks and Signs of Addiction
help.gambling.s4.content: Problem gambling can lead to financial difficulties and harm mental health. If you find yourself unable to stop betting, developing a strong dependency, or having daily life affected, don't ignore these warning signs. Seeking help early is responsible behavior.
help.gambling.s5.title: Moderation Ensures Long-Term Enjoyment
help.gambling.s5.content: Moderate entertainment enriches life, but excessive indulgence only brings harm and stress. Always remind yourself: 'Gambling should be a supplement to life, not the center of it.'
help.fair.title: Fairness — {site} Is Committed to a Fair and Transparent Gaming Environment
help.fair.intro: At {site}, we firmly believe that only a gaming experience built on fairness and trust can truly let players enjoy betting. We uphold the principles of openness, justice, and fairness, committed to providing the safest and most transparent gaming platform.
help.fair.s1.title: Internationally Certified Random Number Generation (RNG)
help.fair.s1.content: All our electronic games use internationally certified Random Number Generators (RNG), ensuring every result is random and unpredictable, eliminating any possibility of manipulation. This technology has been tested and verified by independent third-party organizations, meeting the highest industry standards.
help.fair.s2.title: Third-Party Fairness Audits
help.fair.s2.content: {site} regularly undergoes game system and data audits by independent third parties, ensuring platform operations meet fairness standards and providing verifiable audit reports. We insist on letting players participate with confidence — trust is our most valuable asset.
help.fair.s3.title: Unbiased Gaming Mechanisms
help.fair.s3.content: We do not influence game outcomes based on player identity, region, or bet amount. Whether you're a newcomer or a seasoned player, every game you participate in at {site} provides equal opportunities and treatment.
help.fair.s4.title: Transparent and Verifiable Game Records
help.fair.s4.content: Players can query complete game and betting records at any time. The platform system retains detailed data, ensuring authenticity and immutability, so every win or loss can be clearly verified.
help.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
help.privacy.s1.title: 1. Privacy Policy
help.privacy.s1.content:
{site} is committed to protecting your personal information. This privacy policy is designed to help you understand what information {site} collects when you use our services, why we collect it, and how we use it.

Please note that this privacy policy constitutes an agreement between you and {site}. This policy is an integral part of {site}'s Terms of Service.

{site} may periodically revise this privacy policy and will notify you by posting revised terms on the {site} platform.
help.privacy.s2.title: 2. Information Collected
help.privacy.s2.content:
{site} treats information that can be used to identify an individual as 'personal information', including but not limited to: first and last name, date of birth, residential or physical address, email address, phone number, or other relevant information.

Personal information collected by {site} may include contact information, shipping information, billing information, transaction history, website usage preferences, and service feedback.
help.privacy.s3.title: 3. Data Collection and Processing Methods
help.privacy.s3.content:
{site} may automatically collect certain data and obtain your personal information through your use of services or communication on the {site} website.

{site} may also obtain personal information from online vendors, service providers, and customer lists legally acquired from third-party vendors. {site} has taken measures to ensure that agreements with third-party service providers protect your privacy.
help.privacy.s4.title: 4. Use of Information
help.privacy.s4.content: {site} uses collected personal information for service provision, customer support, security and identity verification, transaction processing, participation in third-party promotions, and other operational purposes.
help.privacy.s5.title: 5. Specific Disclosure Exceptions
help.privacy.s5.content: When required by law, or when {site} believes in good faith it is necessary, your personal information may be disclosed to: (1) comply with legal processes; (2) protect and maintain {site}'s rights or property; (3) protect the safety of users or the public.
help.privacy.s6.title: 6. Access Rights
help.privacy.s6.content: You may opt out of receiving any promotional communications through account settings, email options, or by contacting customer service at any time.
help.privacy.s7.title: 7. Cookie Policy
help.privacy.s7.content:
{site} may store small text files (Cookies) on your device when you access our services, used to record preferences and track usage to improve services.

{site} uses three types of Cookies: session cookies (visit duration only), persistent cookies (retained for a period), and analytical cookies (for visitor and usage statistics).

You may refuse Cookies through your browser settings, but this may prevent you from using all interactive features of the {site} website.
help.privacy.s8.title: 8. Consent to Use Electronic Service Providers
help.privacy.s8.content:
To participate in real-money gaming on {site}, you need to send and receive funds. {site} may use third-party electronic payment systems to process such financial transactions.

By accepting this privacy policy, you expressly consent to {site} transmitting and sharing your personal information with third-party electronic payment service providers as necessary to process transactions.
help.about.title: About Us
help.about.intro: {site} is committed to being your most trustworthy, fair, and entertaining online gaming platform. Since our founding, we've upheld the philosophy of 'Fairness First, Enjoyment at Heart, Responsibility Together', combining world-class gaming technology with rigorous service management to make every bet one you can trust.
help.about.s1: Technology-Driven: Using internationally certified RNG mechanisms and partnering with top game providers, offering hundreds of games including live casino, slots, and lottery — ensuring every result is completely random and unbiased.
help.about.s2: Transparent Auditing: Regular audits conducted with third-party organizations on games and systems, with open player access to betting and winning records, creating a flawless gaming environment.
help.about.s3: Customer-Centric: 24/7 customer service online to answer your questions, with complete transaction records and security mechanisms so you can play and transact with confidence.
help.about.s4: Responsible Awareness: Advocating responsible gaming, providing budget control and time management tools, with underage protection mechanisms to keep entertainment healthy and safe.
help.about.vision.title: Our Vision
help.about.vision.content: {site} is not just a gaming platform, but a comprehensive experience space. We value user experience and are committed to building a brand where players can 'play with confidence, play with excitement, play for the long run.' We will continue enhancing platform technology, expanding game varieties, optimizing mobile experiences, and partnering with industry leaders to create more exclusive events and innovative gameplay.
help.terms.title: Terms of Service
help.terms.intro:
Welcome to our application. These terms and conditions and the documents mentioned herein (the 'Terms') apply to the use of {site} (the 'Website') and its related or connected services (collectively, the 'Services').

You should read these Terms carefully as they contain important information about your rights and obligations when using the Website, and constitute a binding legal agreement between you — our customer ('Customer') — and us.
help.terms.s1.title: 1. Grant of License
help.terms.s1.content:
1.1. Subject to these Terms, {site} grants users a non-exclusive, personal, non-transferable right to use the Services to access games on the Website.

1.2. The Services may not be used by: (i) individuals under 18 years of age; (ii) individuals who have not reached the legal age in their jurisdiction; (iii) individuals accessing Services from regions where they are illegally provided.

1.3. {site} reserves all intangible rights, including copyright, trade secrets, intellectual property, and other rights.
help.terms.s2.title: 2. Disclaimer
help.terms.s2.content:
2.1. {site} provides Services 'as is' and makes no express or implied warranties regarding their quality, suitability, completeness, or accuracy.

2.2. Although {site} strives to ensure smooth operation, we do not guarantee continuous, timely, or error-free service.
help.terms.s3.title: 3. Cancellation / Terms of Service
help.terms.s3.content: You agree to comply with the game rules described on the {site} website. {site} has the right to publish, maintain, and close Services. Any management decision regarding service use or dispute resolution is final.
help.terms.s4.title: 4. Your Obligations as a Player
help.terms.s4.content:
4.1. You have reached or exceeded the legal gambling age in your jurisdiction.

4.2. You participate in games solely for personal, non-commercial entertainment purposes and in your own name.

4.3. All information provided to {site} in payment details is true, complete, and accurate.

4.4. You are responsible for reporting and paying taxes on any winnings obtained from {site}.

4.5. You shall not engage in any fraudulent, collusive, manipulative, or other illegal activities.
help.terms.s5.title: 5. Prohibited Uses
help.terms.s5.content:
5.1. Services are for personal use only. Users may not create multiple accounts for profit or abuse.

5.2. Residents of prohibited jurisdictions may not use the Services. Circumvention methods such as falsifying location data are strictly prohibited.
help.terms.s6.title: 6. Know Your Customer (KYC)
help.terms.s6.content: {site} reserves the right to require users to provide necessary KYC documents at any time to verify identity and location. Services and payments may be restricted until verification is complete.
help.terms.s7.title: 7. Breach
help.terms.s7.content:
7.1. If a user partially or fully breaches these Terms, {site} reserves the right to terminate the agreement and take legal action.

7.2. You agree to indemnify and hold {site} harmless from any claims, losses, or expenses arising from breach of this agreement.
help.terms.s8.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
help.terms.s8.content:
8.1. {site} shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or misuse of Services.

8.2. This agreement does not limit {site}'s liability for death or personal injury caused by negligence.
help.terms.s9.title: 9. Disputes
help.terms.s9.content: If you have a complaint, please contact {site}'s customer service team. If unresolved, you may seek legal remedy under applicable law.
help.terms.s10.title: 10. Modifications
help.terms.s10.content: {site} reserves the right to modify this agreement or Services at any time without notice. Continued use of Services constitutes acceptance of modifications.
help.terms.s11.title: 11. Governing Law
help.terms.s11.content: This agreement is governed by the laws of Curaçao and subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of Curaçao courts. If any provision is found invalid, the remaining provisions remain in effect.
help.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
help.faq.q1: What if I forget my password?
help.faq.a1: If you forget your password, you can reset it within 15 seconds through our 'Forgot Password' link. After requesting a reset, follow the instructions in the email we send you.
help.faq.q2: I lost my phone. How do I reset my Google Authenticator?
help.faq.a2: Unfortunately, we cannot update this information. If you need to change your phone number or email, we recommend closing your current account and opening a new one.
help.faq.q3: Can I change my phone number or email address?
help.faq.a3: Each blockchain transaction requires several cycles to confirm the transfer. Generally, each transaction takes 5-10 minutes to be confirmed by the blockchain network. If you encounter any issues with deposits or withdrawals, visit www.blockchain.info to check your transaction, or contact technical support.
help.faq.q4: How long do deposits and withdrawals take?
help.faq.a4: Minimum deposit is 1 USDT or equivalent in other currencies. Minimum withdrawal is 5 USDT or equivalent in other currencies.
help.faq.q5: What is the minimum USDT amount for deposits and withdrawals?
help.faq.a5: Minimum deposit is 1 USDT or equivalent in other currencies. Minimum withdrawal is 5 USDT or equivalent in other currencies.
help.faq.q6: How do I make a deposit?
help.faq.a6: Go to the 'Deposit' page, click the deposit option, copy the wallet address, or scan the QR code to make payment. For fiat currency deposits, select any supported currency as needed.
help.faq.q7: How do I make a withdrawal?
help.faq.a7: Go to the 'Withdrawal' page, enter the wallet address and amount you wish to withdraw (note the transaction fees).
help.disclaimer.title: Responsible Gaming
help.disclaimer.intro: For your own benefit, please read the following information carefully.
help.disclaimer.s1.title: About Responsible Gaming
help.disclaimer.s1.content:
For most users, gambling is a source of entertainment and excitement. However, we also recognize that gambling can have negative effects on some users. In the medical community, pathological gambling is recognized as a serious condition.

Since our founding, we have always paid attention to this issue and done our best to help. Our understanding of 'responsible gaming' means that gaming service providers take multiple measures to help reduce the likelihood of negative effects.

The most important tool for preventing negative gambling effects is education about gambling risks to strengthen users' self-control abilities.
help.disclaimer.s2.title: {site} Responsible Gaming Advice
help.disclaimer.s2.items: Set deposit limits: Before gambling, consider how much you can afford based on your financial situation. Only play with amounts meant purely for entertainment.
Never chase losses: Try not to take huge risks to win back previous losses. Gambling is for entertainment, not a means of making money.
Set time limits: Set gaming time limits and stick to them strictly. Remember, gambling should be balanced with your other hobbies and should not be your only pastime.
Play wisely: Do not play when feeling extremely stressed, depressed, or under pressure. Also, never gamble under the influence of medication, drugs, or alcohol.
Take breaks: When you notice fatigue or inability to concentrate, take a proper break.
One account only: To more easily track time and money spent on gambling, it is strongly recommended that each person creates only one account.
help.disclaimer.s3.title: Protection of Minors
help.disclaimer.s3.content: You must be at least 18 years old (or meet the legal age requirement in your jurisdiction) to use our services. To prevent account misuse, please safeguard your login credentials and keep them away from minors.
help.disclaimer.s4.title: Self-Exclusion
help.disclaimer.s4.content:
If you have been diagnosed with gambling addiction, or wish to stay away from gambling for other reasons, we are willing to help you avoid harmful environments. 'Self-exclusion' means you voluntarily choose to stop using all gaming services. This exclusion cannot be revoked within the set period.

If you wish to self-exclude, please contact our customer service and provide a period between 6 months and 5 years.

Remember, self-exclusion is permanent for the set period and cannot be revoked. During self-exclusion, you may not create new accounts.
